1.content: Which Star Wars character would you like to start out with?
1.title: Choose Your Character

15.content: Which characters would you like to write about?
15.title: More Choices

info.brief_description: Strange things occur in the Star Wars universe, affecting Yoda other Star Wars aliens!
info.description:
This is mainly an interactive for Yoda and any other non-human characters of Star Wars, while gaining muscle is the main focus. Male-only is much preferred but female characters are welcome.

Lastly, this isn't a requirement, but at least 1000 characters for each non-choice chapter is much appreciated.
info.pretty_title: Aliens of Star Wars Muscle Growth
